metadata.name: Mindscape 5:55 pm
metadata.description:
Fueled by a desire to bring meditative movements to the digital world, I have created 5 unique 1/1 NFT’s inspired by my process based artwork. This is my genesis NFT, "Mindscape 5:55 pm". The forms you see floating were made with latex + spray paint; manipulated with wind, heat and gravity to create texturized forms inspired by visions seen while cloud spotting. 

The goal: levitate your mind, give it space to breathe, and meditate on your “Mindscape”. Each “Mindscape” was color coded to match the atmospheric shade during its titled time. "Mindscape 5:55 pm" ushers in a calming coral hue that closes out the day in peace.

Your NFT will be paired with a custom, 8 x 10 inch physical piece of artwork called a "Meditation Study". “Meditation Studies” are made by pouring thick layers of latex paint over several days; creating textural ripples, drips and droops.

30 FPS.  25 sec. 2674 x 2160

More on Mindscapes: <https://artistreneephillips.com/nft>
